page.title: 10MAKING A LIVING
page.content: My dad is a very busy man. He has a herd of cattle, 21 cows and several calves at the moment. In the winter we all help to feed the cows because there is little grass growing. I sometimes drive the tractor when we take the hay down to the park. In the summer we do not feed them as there is plenty grass. About six weeks ago the cows were put out to summer grazing at {Ardvar,}21km. from our house.The only cow left in the park at{Clashmore}is Blondie, our pet. My dad also does jobs for other people. He builds houses, walls, roads and he does plumbing and all sorts of things.He built our house and it is lovely. When he needs materials he travels to{Inverness}to collect them with his lorry. My younger brother Mark usually works with my dad but he will be starting school in August.
